details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.2.10 Content streams
details.description: A content stream shall not contain any operators not defined in PDF Reference even if such operators are bracketed by the BX/EX compatibility operators

rule.description: A content stream shall not contain any operators not defined in PDF Reference even if such operators are bracketed by the BX/EX compatibility operators

error.message: A content stream contains an operator not defined in PDF Reference
